name: Virginia Twenty One Suite
description: A distinctive suite in the Virginia Tower featuring unique appointments and generous space. The Virginia Twenty One Suite offers a comfortable living area and premium amenities for an elevated stay at the Eldorado Resort in downtown Reno.
shortDescription: Distinctive suite in the Virginia Tower with unique appointments and generous space.

meta.title: Virginia Twenty One Suite – Eldorado Reno | Golf The High Sierra
meta.description: Book the Virginia Twenty One Suite at Eldorado Resort Reno – distinctive suite with unique appointments in the Virginia Tower.
